/* VyOS NAT Configuration */
nat {
    source {
        rule 100 {
            description "Masquerade to WAN"
            outbound-interface eth0
            source {
                address 10.0.0.0/24
            }
            translation {
                address masquerade
            }
        }
        rule 200 {
            description "SNAT for specific hosts"
            outbound-interface eth0
            source {
                address 10.0.0.50
            }
            translation {
                address 192.168.1.50
            }
        }
    }
    destination {
        rule 10 {
            description "DNAT to web server"
            destination {
                port 80,443
            }
            inbound-interface eth0
            protocol tcp
            translation {
                address 10.0.0.10
            }
        }
        rule 20 {
            description "DNAT to SSH jumphost"
            destination {
                port 2222
            }
            inbound-interface eth0
            protocol tcp
            translation {
                address 10.0.0.5
                port 22
            }
        }
    }
}
